post:
Hey again! Our new nodes are ready in in our Datacenter which is also TÜV certified (Level 3) and ISO/IEC 27001 certified as well as ISO 9001 certified.

We are back with new nodes having the following config, we started using SSD's in RAID 10 instead of enterprise SATA Drives, we guarantee blazing fast service, support and performance.

2x Xeon(R) CPU E5-2620 v4 @ 2.10GHz
<br>64 GB ECC Reg Memory DDR4
<br>8x 960 GB Kingston KC400 SSDs (RAID 10)
<br>2 HE Chassie
<br>Adaptec 8805 Hardware RAID Controller inclusive BBU for Write Caching.
